action.action-desc: Mr. Suozzi introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to States to develop, improve, or maintain a State registry of advance directives.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the State Registries for Advance Directives Act of 2022.

section.header: Grants for State registries of advance directives

subsection.text: The Secretary of Health and Human Services may award grants to States to develop, improve, or maintain, directly or by contract, a State registry of advance directives.
To carry out this section, there is authorized to be appropriated $5,000,000 for the period of fiscal years 2023 through 2027.
